column4: Hey all. I just set my screen res on install to 1600x1200 and I cant now kill X and try to run xorg conf
how can I get to the console to run it
do ctl+alt+F1 and log in, then do killall gdm
What was the command to run the xorg config?
umm I think X -config or X -conf something like that
not sure, never used it.  do lspci and see
if it was set by auto detect hardware, should I leave it as is?
if it's not working like it should, no, but otherwise
what was the way to quit it?
press esc, then colon, then q, then enter
Is there a website which lists refresh rates for many monitors?
yes, it's address is www.google.com :)  search, and you will find
I can't remember my monitors name off hand, so I was looking for a list roflmao
Is there a default xorg.conf file?
